mapper.insert: insert into waterRate (companyId,consumeType,goWaterType,stopWaterType,rate1Status,rate1ConsumeFare,rate1ConsumeCycle,rate1NextDayReset,rate2Status,rate2BeginTime,rate2EndTime,rate2Value1,rate2Value2,rate2CardTypes,rate3Status,rate3BeginTime,rate3EndTime,rate3Value1,rate3Value2,rate3CardTypes,rate4Status,rate4BeginTime,rate4EndTime,rate4Value1,rate4Value2,rate4CardTypes,rate5DeductFare,rate5DeductCycle) select #{companyId},consumeType,goWaterType,stopWaterType,rate1Status,rate1ConsumeFare,rate1ConsumeCycle,rate1NextDayReset,rate2Status,rate2BeginTime,rate2EndTime,rate2Value1,rate2Value2,rate2CardTypes,rate3Status,rate3BeginTime,rate3EndTime,rate3Value1,rate3Value2,rate3CardTypes,rate4Status,rate4BeginTime,rate4EndTime,rate4Value1,rate4Value2,rate4CardTypes,rate5DeductFare,rate5DeductCycle from waterRateBase
